introduction_text:
Shree Lohana Mahajan - DSM

CENSUS 2020


Dear Mahajan Members,

Please Fill this Census Form which will enable the management to update the Database.

﻿KINDLY READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW CAREFULLY

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. The form should be filled on Family Basis. (if a Person is Married then its considered as a separate family from his parent)
  2. Number indicated on Whatsapp column will be automatically kept in Samaj Security Group
  3. Please fill Form in BLOCK LETTERS (Except for Email address). Fields with Asterisk Sign (*) are mandatory.
  4. Head of Family Name should be repeated with others details on the TABLE below.
  5. Do not Leave a BLANK NEW line on the table below before saving. Make sure you do not have any empty Line on the table before you SAVE.
name: lohana-mahajan
title: Lohana Mahajan Family Details

web_form_fields.description: Enter Head of Family Full Name
web_form_fields.label: Family Head Name (*)

web_form_fields.description: Enter Full Name to be used to send any Invitation or Circular
web_form_fields.label: Name on Invitation (*)

web_form_fields.description: Enter your Residence physical address as detailed as possible
web_form_fields.label: Physical Address

web_form_fields.description: Enter your Postal Box number and Region Name
web_form_fields.label: P.O. Box No.

web_form_fields.description: START WITH FAMILY HEAD NAME IN THE TABLE BELOW AND THEN OTHER MEMBERS.
web_form_fields.label: Family Member Details (INCLUDING HEAD OF THE FAMILY)
